text: Preparing the noodles Heat the water in a saucepan. When water becomes quite hot, switch off the stove. Add the noodle pack to the water. Close it with a lid. Preparing the paste Take a pan and put it on the stove on a medium flame or heat.  Pour some oil in the hot pan. Add the tomatoes, onions, red chilies, and spices like cinnamon, curry leaves, and fenugreek. Fry until cooked, then turn off the stove. Allow the cooked ingredients to cool under a fan.  Once the mixture is cool, grind it into a paste form.  Preparing the vegetables and chicken Put the pan on the stove. Pour a little oil once the pan is hot. Fry all the vegetables/fried chicken. This includes the green peas, soy sauce, and chili sauce. Add the ground paste. Allow the ingredients to boil. Serving up Drain the noodles just as everything is cooked.  Add the cooked noodles to the vegetables and chicken pieces. Stir well. Serve straight away. Your spicy tangy tomato noodle dish is ready.
